full_summary:
**Resiliency Training Program**

**Notice Title**: Resiliency Training Program
**Solicitation Number**: 21401-25-4369226
**Publication Date**: June 12, 2023
**Closing Date**: July 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Public Works Category**: SRV (Services)

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**:
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide a resiliency training program for staff working in high trauma healthcare and security environments.

**Objective**:
The selected contractor must develop and deliver an individual resiliency training program to enhance the well-being of CSC staff exposed to daily trauma, and provide tools to address potential mental health issues.

**Key Deliverables**:
- Provide staff with practical tools to manage their mental health and enhance their resilience
- Identify triggers and engage in preventative activities
- Comply with all relevant legislations and regulations

**Duration of Contract and Time Frame for Delivery**:
The contract duration is three (3) years, from September 1, 2023 to August 31, 2026, with an option to renew for one (1) additional year.

**Location of Work**:
The contract will be delivered in Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.

**Contact Information**:
- Danielle Murdoch, Contracting Officer
- danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca
- (343) 422-4831

**Additional Documents**:
The tender notice, amendment, and RFP are available on the Canada Buys website.

**Attachment**:
- Solicitation document statement of work and basis of payment
- Attachment 1: Amendment to the Request for Proposal (RFP)
- Attachment 2: Resiliency Training Program RFP
